name: Magical Boombox
description:
Defeat some monsters with your summoned creatures, and how do you do it? by playing some tunes with a magical boombox.

NOTE: PLEASE TRY DOWNLOADING THE WINDOWS VERSION IF THE WEB BUILD DOESN'T LOAD

Tutorial:

Eliminate all enemies by shifting through the music to summon different creatures that will attack the enemies but beware that your summoned creature also attacks you. Collect cassette that is generated once each wave to increase summoned creature. So get to the highest wave you can get.

Control:

  • Arrow Keys to move.
  • Hold Left Shift to run.
  • A and D to cycle through music.
  • Space to zoom in to the boombox and also pause the game, so press Space again to resume.

Used Assets Credits:

  • Sound Effects: Leohpaz
  • Music: Escalonamusic
  • Tileset: Aamatniekss
  • AI: Arongranberg
